extendedInfo.description: it is amazing app that lets you add wisdoms, quotes, and any other valuable shorts texts to your home screen as a widget-you can download a lot of preset packages from the internet, directly within the app.-you can edit the downloaded packages, or build your own packages from within the app.-you can add multible packages each of them for one type of contnet.-you can add multiple widgets, each of them for one package.-the content of the widget will be changed every day.-the app is available in English, and Arabic for now.don't forget, you can publicly publish your own packages, to do that:-download this file http://www.mediafire.com/?mmabn5xmjgrllhp-fill the file with at least 50 texts-send the file to support@digital-soft.org -we will review and add the package publicly to the available packages.
